name: LOST MEXICO
description:
Lost Mexico is a strategy video game set in the Mexican-American War, in which you will lead your troops in fast and frenetic battles, where the only thing that matters is victory.

Progress the campaign and immerse yourself in more than 15 battles that the game offers.

Mouse left click-Select unit

Mouse right click-Move unit

Esc-Exit battle

Space bar-Pause

WASD-Move around the map
